system.description: An electronic cigarette, also known as an e-cig, is a battery powered device that simulates smoking. It delivers nicotine into the lungs via a nicotine, propylene glycol, and flavoring mixture, designed to look like, but be much healthier than cigarettes, as instead of smoke, it produces water vapor as its byproduct. Electronic cigarettes come in a massive array of flavors, from regular tobacco flavor to things such as mint, key lime pie, and even cinnamon roll. They take on a variety of appearances as well, from a thin cigarette like look, to a customizable tank and battery. The price listed is for a full kit that includes one tank, one battery with charging apparatus, and two flavors.
